pages.text: The gaseous form of brine, made by putting $(l:item/salt)salt$(/l) in a $(l:block/chemical_oxidizer)Chemical Oxidizer$(/l), or by evaporating liquid brine in a $(l:block/rotary_condensentrator)Rotary Condenstrator$(/l).
The Condenstrator can also turn it back into liquid brine, by pressing the "Switch Operation" toggle.
